There are only 37 public early childhood education programs in Community Board 9—fewer than in Community Boards 12, 11, 10, and 3

Community Board 12

155 programs

Community Board 9

Community Board 10

Community Board 1

Note: Locations that house multiple programs are shown as one point. This map includes the locations of both 3-K programs and Pre-K programs. Schools that offer both 3-K and Pre-K programs have been recorded as one program.

Source: NYC MySchools

Graphic by Molly Durawa
